name: SimplePCI Data Document
summary: Learn about .CXD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: SimplePCI is legacy software and has been replaced by HCImage, which also uses the CXD format.

description: File used by SimplePCI microscopy imaging software; contains data captured from a connected piece of microscope equipment; can save a single image or image sequences; used for image acquisition and analysis.
